description: Returns the auto-termination policy for an Amazon EMR cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the Amazon EMR cluster for which the auto-termination policy will be fetched.

nested_items.name: AutoTerminationPolicy
nested_items.description: Specifies the auto-termination policy that is attached to an Amazon EMR cluster.

nested_items.name: IdleTimeout
nested_items.description: Specifies the amount of idle time in seconds after which the cluster automatically terminates. You can specify a minimum of 60 seconds and a maximum of 604800 seconds (seven days).
